div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio tercio die Junij
anno quo supra

Jonhne colisone procuratour to Jonhne blabir sone and ayr to vmquhile
Dauid blabir producit and schew in Jugement ane testimonial' of Sesin
vndir the Sele of alexander balye for that tyme of certane croftis liand' in
futy and toftis betuix the landis of Duncan harpar one that northt parte
and the lande of vmquhile Jonhne rede flessar one the southt parte quhilk
beinge rede the aldirman and balyeis admittit the saide possession' lauchfule
and to be obeyt as efferit eftir the tenor' of the samyn for ony richt that
thai hede seyne in contrar' and the said' Jonhne to be obeit tharintill vnto
the tyme thar be mair' richt schevin to tham euermanis richt beinge
sayf

the samyn day Jonhne lu'u' overwrites 'y'.ytone' lammyngtone protestit that the
testimoniale of Sesin producit be Jonhne Colisone in Jugement as
procuratour to Jonhne blabir of Certane toftis and croftis liand' in futy vndir
the Sele of alexander rede suld' turne him to nay preiudice anent
his richt tile ane rige liand' in futy pertening to him as he allegit

The samyn day the borghe' strekit be Androw Wentone apone thomas
mar was fundin of nayne availe anent the clame of compt rekning
and pament of iijxx li' g' and the said thomas quyt of his challance
tharanent becaus' he deponit the aithe eftir the tenor' of the ak mad
tharapon' obefor ordanit be ane suorne assis'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio Septimo
die Junij Anno quo supra

the samyn day Androw lammyntone was in Amerciament of the court for the
wranguis' strubulance of William blicht and to Amend' to him as law
wile and forbere in tyme to cum

In the balye court of Abirdene haldin the xiij day of June the yer' forsaid' et cetera
Jonhne low was lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer' to the borghe strekit
be William philp tharfor the balyeis chargit philp Dunbrek seriand' to pas' and tak ane
distres' fra the saide Jonhne and lat it to borghe and it be askit and warne
to comper this day xv dais to ansuer to the saide borghe as the secunde day
of proces' and to her the witnes producit that day suorne to depone in the said'
action' with intimacion' quethir he comper' nocht et cetera thar deposicionis wilbe takin
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi antedicti xvjo die mensis Junij anno quo supra

the samyn day comperit sere Jonhne ruthirfurde aldirman and complenyet to the balyeis
Sittande in Jugement that Jonhne Watsone wranguislie and agan the law
hede maide wrange rehers' apone him and distrubulit him sayand' that he
hede takin avay demi a pety quartar of Salt of his fra the key at
his avne hande quhilkis he wald nocht Sustene for vc lib' and the saide
Jonhne beinge accusit be the balyeis denyit the saide strubulance and in continent
it was put to the decision' of thir personis vndir writin chosin with batht
thar consentis and opinly suorne in ane assis' in thar presence that is to say
Jonhne Colisone alexander rede thomas prat alexander mar' Dauid matheson Wat
auchneyve Dauid prat Robert Crage William fuchis William andirson' Riche
rde hile murtho glenmaluyn James Colison' Androw murray yongar' ande
Symon gardin' quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis resonis and allegacionis
witnes in presens of batht the said partiis herd seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit
be the moutht of the saide Alexander rede forspekar of the saide assis'
that thai coud' nocht acquyt the saide Jonhne Watsone of the wranguis'
rehers' makinge distrubulinge ande dispersoning of the aldirman for the
quhilkis the saide Jonhne was in Ane amerciament of the court and til Amende
to the aldirman as law will and to forber in tyme to cum and gevin
for dome be the moutht of Jonhne Williamson' dempstar of the Court

The saide day henryk crage was fundin quyt be ane Suorne assis' thomas
prat forspekar' of xxxtj Inglis' grotis follouit be Alexander glenny and the saide Alexander in ane
amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borghe' strekin apon the said' henrik and he quyt
of his challance of the said' xxx Inglis' grotis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Junij
Anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman balyeis consal and communite present for the tyme and gathreit
be the premunicion and warning of the hande bell throw the towne at the Instance
and plesour of ane nobile lorde alexander lorde gordone grantit to pay and refund'
Samekile of the kingis taxt as the said lord borrouit fra the balyeis that was
grantit till the ambaxtouris passinge for his mariage quhilkis extendis to lxvj li'
pundis and tene schillingis for his fauoris gratuiteys and thankis done and to be done
to thame In tymes to Cum

the samyn day Williame blinsele Dauid matheson Robert crage Jonhne grige
and James crak was chosin and suorne taxtouris be the tone to taxt and extent
be thar aithis and constrene tuenty pundis tharof xiiij l' to the ambaxtouris passinge to
Denmark and vj li' for costis and expensis maid for the gude of merchandice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die Junij anno
quosupra

the samyn day Androw lammyntone grantit him avand' to Jonhne
lammynton' xxij s' and vj d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him pay within the
terme of law And' anent' ij peter of talche clamyt be the saide Jhon' the said
Androw tuk to preif the saide talche pait this day aucht dais

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio vicesimo Septimo die
Junij Anno quo supra

the said' day William philp was in Amerciament of the court
for the wranguis' borghe strekin apon hii the wyf of vmquhile Jonhne gregory
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xv s' iiij li' xvi s' for the tak of perslie
ix f' of ber' and xij barrelis atis j demi barrel ber' and scho quyt of his clame be ane
suorne assis' Jonhne Colison forspekar

the samyn day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to William philp
tile ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon him be Jonhne low for the wrang
uis' haldin fra his wyf of iiij barrelis ber' and ij barrelis atis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviij die Julij Anno quo supra

the samyn day Elizibeth' menyeis spous to Alexander chamer follouit medy cadiow
spous to Jonhne fechat for the wranguis' distrubuly'y' overwrites 'a'.ng of hir' quhilkis scho
denyit Ande In continent the saide action' was putt till the decisione
of ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin that is to say Alexander rede thomas prat
Androw murray eldar Will goldsmyth William Dunbrek thomas Waus Will
philp Dauid Duffous' Jonhne tuliboy Dauid strachin' and Jonhne slugy quhilkis
the gret aith suorne deliuerit be the moutht of the saide Alexander rede forspekar
and talisman of the saide assis' that thai coud' nocht acquyt the saide medy
cadiow nay scho hede saide that the saide Elizibeth' menyes hed' brokin'
challice makand' hir beltis with for the quhilkis scho was in Amerciament of the courte

the saide day it was statute and ordanit be the aldirman balyes and diuers' of
the Consale for gude and common' profit of merchandice that nay merchand'man
sal tak ane vthir merchandis callande out of his hande nor seduce
him fra his merchande vnto the tyme he and his merchande haf maid' compt
rekning and pament Ilkan till vthir And' quha dois in contrar' salbe pvnist
as law will be the sicht and ordinance of the aldirman and consall for the
tym'
Curia balliuoum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio octauo augusti anno quo supra

the said day the balyeis ordanit and assignit Jonhne retre to gif compte
rekning and pament to murtho glenmaluyn of iiij li' g' of his fraucht within xxiiij
houris eftir thomas prat cum hame And falyeinge tharof to ansuer one the morne
thareftir to the burghe' strekit apon him be the said murthow for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of iiij li' g' to compt and rekning

vndecimo die augusti anno quo supra thomas prat inuenit Dauid menyeis Juniorem
plegium legalem quod Andreas murray senior et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro se et
parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Idem Andreas inuenit alexandrum rede plegium
legalem quod dictus thomas et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro se et parte sua aliter
quam per viam Juris et qualibet dictarum parcium obligatur per ostensionem manuum ad conser
uandum plegios suos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xiij die augusti anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne Wormet grantit that the salmonde cerssit and
arestit be the aldirman in the hous' of alexander talyour is his gudis ande
gaf Siluer to by thame iij quartaris of ane yer bigan

the saide day Jonhne Wormet become Souerte be his hand vphaldin
to Entir Alexander talyour befor the seref court in the seref court or befor the
balyes to ansuer at the Instance of the aldirman to the thinge that he
has to say till him quhen euir he beis requirit tharto
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo augusti anno quo supra

the samyn day Thomas chavmer and David stevart set Jonhe collisone ande
thomas prat souertie be thar' landis and gudis thar' handis vphaldin that the
Inglis' schip callit the Ane of lundin ande Wilyam Wat Inglisman mastir ondir god
of the samyn the marinaris and gudis beand in hir salbe vnstrubulit vnhurt
ande vnscathit bath be lande and seye ffor the said thomas and Dauid thar' complicis
and schip callit the barbora and marinaris of the samyn eftir the tenor' of our' souerane
lordis salfcondoct In presens of the aldirman and balyeis thir' witnes Dauid menyes
Robert blinsel Alexander red Wilyam' abirdour' and Dauid prat

The said day Dauid murray protestit solempnie that quhat Dauid Kintor' or
thomas prat or' thar procuratouris dois anent his fee and his heretage suld
turin him to na pregedies

Eodem die Dauid Kintor' fecit constituit et ordinauit patricium gordoun' et thomam prat
coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum et defendendum croftum per Johannem
Kintor Andree murray alienatum ut asseretur in vberiora forma procuratorii promitten
do ratum gratum et cetera

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit x this day xv dayis to lindesay
herrold' to bring ande schaw be for thaim lauchful dificence of ane act' maid'
to Dauid menyes of twa berelis salmond' as day of peremtour Ande felyeand'
tharof to pay to the said Dauid the twa berelis salmond' forsaide

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo
die augusti Anno quo supra

Eodem die Agnes thomsone Elena thomsone and Agnes thomson'
comperti fuerunt proprie et legittime heredes quondam Walteri thomsone
patris suj Igitur datum fuit per prepositum consilium et balliuos Andree culan
balliuo in mandatis ad cognoscendum dictas personas ad terras et annuos
redditus sibi pertinentes Jacentes infra dictum burgum

the samyn day Duncan straloche officiar at commawnde of the aldirman and
balyeis chargit be his wande Jonhne yanlow to remane within the
tolbutht quhill he content and payt til androw branche the some that he
grantit him awand to the saide Androw befor thomas fyf balye

the samyn day the aldirman grantit ane burges and ane forstallar
tile Androw murray eldar the first he will cheis for the ourgevin of ane
croft quhilk he bocht fra Jonhne Kintor and resignit it at the aldirmannis
request to be gevin to thomas prat Alsua Alexander rede grantit him souerte
that the aldirman sal do stede to Androw murray for the remanent of xx crovnis

The samyn day Jonhne blak come Souerte be his landis and gudis his hand
vphaldin that to keip Elene lilburne the relict of vmquhill Walter thomsone
hir ayris executoris and assignez skathles of ane Siluer pece ane siluer salfalt'
the half of the thridpart of the butht of vmquhile the said Walteris
and of ane rede tuschay and als' to kep Dauid matheson' his ayris
executoris and assignez' skathtles of the said gudis quhilkis gudis pertenit
to Agnes thomsone yongast douchter to the said Walter quhilkis scho
resauit excepte the saide tuschay that was the saide Jonhnis avne
propir gudis In presens of the aldirman and balyeis and the haill courte
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vltimo die augusti Anno quo supra

the samyn day William lammyntone grantit him awand' to thome Waus
xxti stane of talche tharof tene stane of nolt talche and tene stane of schiptalche'
to be pait betuix this and yule next to cum quhilkis talche the saide thomas
assignit to thome narne of the quhilkis talche the saide William is pait

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die
Septembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Willelmus Kimdy est filius
ac legittimus propinquior heres quondam petri Kymdy patris suj constabilarij
de Abirdene Igitur prepositus diuersis consilij dederunt Andree branche balliuo
In mandatis ad cognoscendum ipsum ad crofta sua et cetera

Eodem die Johannes gilespy amerciatur pro perturbio Roberti ouchterles' et Idem
Robertus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Johannis per assisam et ad emendandum
vt Jura volunt Insuper dictus Johannes inuenit Alexandrum chamer de murchill
plegium legalem quod dictus Robertus et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte
sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus Robertus inuenit Robertum Crage
plegium legalem quod idem Johannes ps pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et
parte sua aliter quam pro viam Juris et qualibet dictarum parcium alteri obligatur
ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis lousit the arrest of the corne
sawin be Jonhne gilespy in ane croft liande in futy and leyt the
samyn to borghe to the saide Jonhne Ande Alexander chamer come Souerte
be his landis and gudis In the nayme of the saide Jhon' to do for the saide
corne that he aw to do of law and resone to Robert of ouchterles'
and ale vthiris that efferis Ande the aldirman and ballieis assignit
monunday that next cumis to the saidez' Jonhne and Robert to schaw
thar Richtis and euidentis of the saide croft befor tham

Eodem die Johannes gilespy fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit Alexandrum
chamer de murchill suum legittimum procuratorem in actionibus inter ipsum et
Robertum ouchterles' et in omnibus aliis sui placitis promitten' de Rato et grato
In vberiora forma procuratorij

Tercio die octobris Anno quo supra Robertus blinsele Johannes Culane Johannes
colisone Johannes Wormet thomas prat Andreas Wyntone et Dauid prat fuerunt electi
per consilium et communitatem ac Jurati ad Audiendum videndum considerandum et concludendum
Compotum domini Johannis ruthirfurde in officio prepositure Anno elapso

the samyne day Jonhne of Culane or he enterit in the office of aldirmanschip
grantit and oblist him to the haill towne Consale and communite tile amende
the offens' done be him to the mene of Danskin be the sicht and commande
of the Consale of the towne that the schipis and merchandice of this burghe
may haue salf and fre passage to the partis of Danskin to do thare
lesum merchandice and repassage lik as thai haue done and vsit tymes
bigane befor the saide offence was conuictit sua that the tone may be fre
for the saide offens'

3o die octobris anno quo supra die legittimo quo Curia capitalis eiusdem burgi tenta fuit
et tota communitas congregata pro electione nouorum officiorum secundum laudabiles consue
tudines burgorum quibus vnanimiter aggregatis dominus Johannes ruthirfurde presentauit suum
compotum de receptis et expensis inde factis in officio suo prepositure anno elapso peten'
Idem videri examinarj et concludi Et immediate Robertus blinsele Johannes Culan Johannes colison
Johannes Wormet thomas prat Andreas Wynton et Dauid prat fuerunt electi per consilium
et communitatem ac Jurati ad audiendum videndum examinandum considerandum et concludendum huiusmodi
compotum
